text:
Question 160) A mother turned to the package insert to check the dosage of a medicine that needed to give her child. In the leaflet, the following dosage was recommended: 5 drops for every 2 kg of body mass every 8 hours.
If the mother correctly gave 30 drops of the medicine to her child every 8 hours, then his body mass is
A) 12 kg.
B) 16 kg.
C) 24 kg.
D) 36 kg.
E) 75 kg.
